articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Atalanta vs Arsenal in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Atalanta 0-0 Arsenal: David Raya makes double save from penalty to earn Gunners point

articles.description: George Ilenikhena scores on his Champions League debut as Monaco beat 10-man Barcelona.
articles.title: Monaco 2-1 Barcelona: George Ilenikhena scores as 10-man Barca beaten in Champions League

articles.description: Los Angeles Dodgers superstar Shohei Ohtani makes baseball history by becoming the first player to hit 50 home runs and steal 50 bases in a season.
articles.title: Shohei Ohtani: Los Angeles Dodgers star makes baseball history with 50th home run

articles.description: Travis Head scores a stunning unbeaten 154 as Australia claim a convincing seven-wicket win over England in the first one-day international at Trent Bridge.
articles.title: England vs Australia: Travis Head century takes tourists to win in first ODI

articles.description: Daniel Dubois slams the table in mild frustration and refuses to engage with Anthony Joshua as the two British heavyweights meet in an understated news conference in London.
articles.title: Anthony Joshua vs Daniel Dubois: Champion Dubois slams table in understated news conference

articles.description: Jose Gimenez heads a 90th-minute winner as Atletico Madrid come from behind to beat RB Leipzig in their Champions League opener.
articles.title: Atletico Madrid 2-1 RB Leipzig: Jose Gimenez claims 90th-minute winner in Champions League opener

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at what happened in the first round of Champions League games and how the new format is looking.
articles.title: Champions League 2024-25: First impressions of new format

articles.description: Brest win the first Champions League match in their history against Sturm Graz with goals from Hugo Magnetti and Abdallah Sima.
articles.title: Brest 2-1 Sturm Graz: French side win first Champions League match

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton has accused FIA president Mohammed Ben Sulayem of using “stereotypical” language with a “racial element”.
articles.title: Singapore Grand Prix: Lewis Hamilton accuses Mohammed Ben Sulayem of using 'stereotypical' language

articles.description: Golfers who play on the Saudi-backed breakaway LIV Golf tour will be allowed to be in the United States Ryder Cup team, the PGA announces.
articles.title: PGA allows LIV golfers in US Ryder Cup team & PGA Championship
